headline: Progressive Insurance® Introduces Accident Response® to Customers Nationwide
summary: Progressive Insurance® today announced the launch of its newest safety feature, Accident Response, to afford customers peace of mind and connect them with emergency or tow services should the unexpected happen on the road.

raw.headline: Progressive Insurance® Introduces Accident Response® to Customers Nationwide
raw.summary: Progressive Insurance® today announced the launch of its newest safety feature, Accident Response, to afford customers peace of mind and connect them with emergency or tow services should the unexpected happen on the road.

headline: Progressive's October Earnings Rise: Here's How to Play the Stock
summary: PGR seems well-poised on improving premiums, steady policy life expectancy, investment in technology and a solid capital position.

raw.headline: Progressive's October Earnings Rise: Here's How to Play the Stock

headline: The Progressive Corporation (PGR) Continued its Strong Performance
summary: Madison Investments, an investment advisor, released its “Madison Sustainable Equity Fund” third quarter 2024 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. All equity classes experienced good results in the third quarter. During the quarter, equity markets ended on a high note, with the S&P 500 achieving a 5.89% increase, bringing the full-year […]
